snippet: Any plan must raise more revenue, contribute to deficit reduction and address the growing nation's growing disparity between rich and poor, Senator Max Baucus said.
abstract: Any plan must raise more revenue, contribute to deficit reduction and address the growing nation's growing disparity between rich and poor, Senator Max Baucus said.

headline.main: Baucus Says Tax Overhaul That Raises Revenues Is Moving Forward
